item.html:
Welcome.

This is a personal movie database.
With this webapplication everyone can keep track of their own movie collection. This website is fast and easy to use.

Create an account and you can add movies to the database and add as many details to the movie as you see fit.

Such details are for instance: actors, directors, screen size, surround sound definition, language of subtitles, trailers and many many more.
You can even keep track to whom you've lend out your movies.
